trans-unit.source: Represents the data context of the current workflow environment and provides a bridge to bring workflow arguments and variables into the scope of Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) data binding.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前工作流环境的数据上下文，并为将工作流自变量和变量纳入 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 数据绑定范围提供桥梁。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of properties managed by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" /> 管理的属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of properties managed by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext" /> 管理的属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value changes.

The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext.PropertyChanged> event can indicate all properties on the object have changed by using either `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the property name in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext.PropertyChanged>事件可以指示对象上的所有属性已都更改通过使用`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的属性名称作为<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>。
